lexnlp.extract.de.dates: Extracting date references¶

The lexnlp.extract.de.dates module contains methods that allow for the extraction of dates from text. Sample formats that are handled by this module include:

  • vom 29. März 2017

  • 16.5.2002

The full list of current unit test cases can be found here: https://github.com/LexPredict/lexpredict-lexnlp/tree/master/lexnlp/extract/common/tests/test_dates

Extracting dates¶

lexnlp.extract.de.dates.get_date_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

Example

>>> import lexnlp.extract.de.dates
>>> text = " Artikel 39 des Gesetzes vom 29. März 2017 (BGBl. I S. 626) geändert worden ist"
>>> print((lexnlp.extract.de.dates.get_date_list(text))
[{'location_start': 29,
 'location_end': 42,
 'value': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 29, 0, 0),
 'source': '29. März 2017'}]
